article_title: Sarah Palin -- Nailin' a Heckler at SNL Party (TMZ TV)
article_text:
Sarah Palin Nailin' a Heckler At SNL Party [TMZ TV]

TMZ TV

Sarah Palin's bit on theshow wasn’t great, but she KILLED IT outside the after-party by destroying a boneheaded heckler -- and we gotta admit ... it makes her a little hotter.

That and the revealing mini-dress she was wearing.
